articles.description: As the the 2023 Men's College World Series swiftly approaches, Mike Lopresti details nine reasons to watch the final eight teams battle for the crown in Omaha.
articles.content:
How many storylines can you stuff into one College World Series?
Here are nine reasons one for each position on Charles Schwab Field to follow whats about to happen in Omaha.
1. See if Wake Forest … [+8656 chars]
